result.arabic_text: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ
result.translation: (202) But their brothers[435] - they [i.e., the devils] increase them in error; then they do not stop short.
result.footnotes: [435]- Those among mankind who listen to the devils and obey their orders.
